junit@yahoogroups.com wrote:
> Hi Robert,
>        I know we are writing the test case in the test script
> itself. If they need the test case they can go and read the
> test script itself. But in my project the business team needs
> seperate test case word document for each test case.The
> business team usually dont have technical knowledge much. so
> they require a test case word document which should be
> readable and understandable by anyone.

What do the business people want to do with the document?

Curious, Ilja
